document_data.name: Eagle of the North
document_data.mainbody: The '''Eagle of the North''' was an [[inn]] found in [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction.
document_data.Location: The inn was located in east Zhentil Keep near the [[Dragon Gate]] within the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. The inn lay at the intersection of [[Fortress Street]] and the [[Street of Dragons]].
document_data.Description: The entire building was drab and appeared to be quite old. Scented brass lamps were to illuminate the interior of the inn which gave it a peculiar smell.
document_data.Activities: Though lacking in luxurious amenities, The Eagle of the North was still more than comfortable while remaining moderately priced. [[Zhentilar]] gate guards often crashed here if they were too drunk to make it home.
